Pooled Edges model.from sentence: 3 . Pooled Edges model - We use the DCNN to encode the question and the label of each edge in the semantic graph .

combination.of: activations ( Eq 1 ) and the previous state

Graph Neural Network ( GNN ).from sentence:
Graph Neural Network ( GNN ) -
To judge the effect of the gated graph neural architecture , we also include a model variant that does not use the gating mechanism and directly computes the hidden state as a combination of the activations ( Eq 1 ) and the previous state .

Gated Graph Neural Network ( GGNN ).from sentence: Gated Graph Neural Network ( GGNN ) - We use the GGNN to process semantic parses , as described in Section 3.2 .
